document.full_text: the iowa senate on monday narrowly approved a measure designed to prevent a doctor who specializes in late-term abortions from opening a planned clinic on the western border of the state.
document.title: iowa senate passes measure aimed at abortion doctor
lines_and_colors: the iowa senate on monday narrowly approved a measure designed to prevent a doctor who specializes in late-term abortions from opening a planned clinic on the western border of the state.
